p: Raw count data of events for both natural and technical are tabulated from 1900–2016; These are designated as Nat-NE (natural events) and for the technical, Ant-NE (anthropogenic events). Cost data (adjusted to the 2014 US dollar) available from 1960–2016 are labeled as Nat-CE (natural, cost per event) and Ant-CE (anthropogenic, cost per event). Both natural and anthropogenic data show a monotonically decreasing trend with cost. Data sets are organized in Table 1.
